lead_paragraph: Jayalalithaa Jayaram, 68, an imperious former starlet, died after a cardiac arrest and had groomed no successor.

headline.print_headline: Death Leaves Power Vacuum in India
headline.main: Death of Tamil Nadu’s Leader Leaves Power Vacuum in Southern India

snippet: Jayalalithaa Jayaram, 68, an imperious former starlet, died after a cardiac arrest and had groomed no successor....
abstract: Unexpected death of Jayalalithaa Jayaram, chief minister of southern Indian state of Tamil Nadu, India, evokes passionate response from her supporters; roughly 78 million people in state face extended period of uncertainty, as Jayaram left behind no clear successor after 25 years of autocratic rule.
